title: UI SOUND FX by serot.one VOL 1
description: 40 professionally crafted UI sounds. 10 soundsets. 4 categories: hover, confirm, back, alert. Plus an additional 60 layer sounds for you to design your own sounds.
longDescription:
Preview: SOUNDCLOUD


Use this sound pack to bring triple-A quality sounds to your game or application's user interface.


This pack contains a wide variety of game-ready/application-ready UI sound effects.


There are 4 main sound types:


-hover

-confirm

-back

-alert


There are 10 soundsets. Each set includes one sound from each of the 4 categories.


There is an additional bonus set:


-layers


This set contains 60 individual layer sounds for you to construct your own menu sounds from, if you choose, inside of Unreal Engine.


All Sound Wave and Sound Cue files are named with 'set01, set02, etc..' for findability.


Every imported Sound Wave file has a referenced Sound Cue file.


Import these sounds into your project to get started.


Enjoy and thank you for supporting our hard work!


-serot.one








keywords: sound effects game mobile app application menu ui interface click wipe whoosh swoosh swish plop poof impact shimmer rattle effect wow world warcraft god war aaa triple a
